short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: save your info to login automaticly

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is for Hasan Kalyoncu University students.
This tool allows you to save your login information for the university's internet network system so you don't have to enter them every time you want to connect to the local network of the university.
Your login information are saved in the browser's local storage 
 so you can save time by using it
